# Dragon Ally (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Calling Spells|calling]])

**Level: [[Dragon (Domain)|Dragon 7]]**, [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, XP

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One called dragon of 18 HD or less

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 72

*You feel some of your lifeforce being pulled from you in the casting of the spell. A large dragon lands nearby. “You wish to discuss something?” it asks, eying your belongings.*

This spell functions like *[[Dragon Ally, Lesser (Spell)|lesser dragon ally]],* except you can call a single dragon of up to 18 HD.

*XP Cost:* 250 XP.

*Special:* Sorcerers cast this spell at +1 caster level.
